backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining types and CRUD operations for products, customers, bills, expenses, and user profiles with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Android wrapper tasks to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend React files and their purposes.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build outputs, IDE files, logs, and local configs.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Gradle config for the Android wrapper including versioning, build types, dependencies, and PWA URL validation.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard rules keeping WebView, Kotlin metadata, and wrapper classes during minification.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Manifest defining permissions, app metadata, launcher activity, and deep linking.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/f: Main Android activity hosting a configured WebView that loads the PWA and handles navigation and file uploads.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Adaptive round icon definition referencing background and foreground assets.
Adaptive icon definition referencing background and foreground assets.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Color resources defining the launcher icon background color.
Defines app name, placeholder PWA URL, and basic error messages.
Defines app themes, colors, and fullscreen style variants.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle config setting Kotlin and Android plugin versions and repositories.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Project-wide Gradle settings including JVM args, AndroidX, Jetifier, and R8 options.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Configures Gradle wrapper distribution and storage paths.
frontend/android/README.md: Instructions for configuring the PWA URL and building the Android wrapper APK.
frontend/android/scripts/build-release-a: Shell script building the release APK with PWA URL validation and output reporting.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Defines plugin management, repositories, root project name, and includes the app module.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry defining PWA metadata, service worker registration, and mounting root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, caching, and fetch handling for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile loading, and screen navigation.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing side navigation, top bar, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/CustomerDialog.t: Dialog component for creating or editing customers with offline queue integration.
frontend/src/components/ProductDialog.ts: Dialog for adding or editing products with validation and offline queue support.
frontend/src/components/SideNav.tsx: Renders a sidebar with navigation buttons and highlights the active screen.
frontend/src/components/SyncIndicator.ts: Displays online status, pending sync count, and sync errors with a retry option.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Shows the app header with sync status, install button, user info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Tracks PWA install availability and exposes a method to trigger the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, products, and customers using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, and print-specific rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/offline/storage.ts: Implements localStorage-backed caching and an offline action queue with timestamps.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflineQueue.ts: Provides a hook to execute actions with fallback queuing when offline or failing.
frontend/src/offline/useSyncStatus.ts: Tracks online status, pending offline actions, and processes a local action queue to sync with the backend.
frontend/src/screens/BillingScreen.tsx: Provides an interface to create bills by selecting customers and products, managing line items, and calculating totals.
frontend/src/screens/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays customer credit summaries by aggregating bill data and showing pending credit statuses.
frontend/src/screens/CustomersScreen.tsx: Lists customers with options to add, edit, or delete them, supporting offline queueing for deletions.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Shows high‑level business stats like product, customer, bill counts, credits, and pending sync status.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Handles user login via Internet Identity and optional profile setup with name and role selection.
frontend/src/screens/ProductsScreen.tsx: Displays products with add, edit, and delete actions, using offline queueing and a dialog for editing.
frontend/src/screens/ReportsScreen.tsx: Generates sales, expense, and profit reports with date filtering and supports creating and deleting expenses.
frontend/src/utils/billingTotals.ts: Provides functions to compute billing totals with GST and handle legacy bill totals.
frontend/src/utils/printInvoice.ts: Builds printable HTML invoices by consolidating line items and computing totals.
frontend/src/utils/reporting.ts: Calculates daily sales, date‑range summaries, and profit including revenue, COGS, and expenses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color palette, layout extensions, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an Android inventory/billing app with MVVM, Firebase offline sync, feature lists, issues, and architectural notes.
